titleStmt.title: Letters from the Marquesse of Argyle, the Earle of Lanerick, Lord Warriston, and others now at Edenburgh, to their friends at London intercepted by Sir Richard Willys ...
titleStmt.author: Argyll, Archibald Campbell, Marquis of, 1598-1661.
Hamilton, William Hamilton, Duke of, 1616-1651.
Warriston, Archibald Johnston, Lord, 1611-1663.
Willes, Richard, Sir, 1613 or 14-1690.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
William Hamilton was known as the Earl of Lanark.
